About Me


Hey, I'm Shreyaa


I'm a software engineer at Uber, building realtime analytics using Apache Pinot. I'm curious about how systems tick behind the scenes, which is why I'm diving deeper into Big Data and DevOps as I go.


This space is my ex-portfolio turned learning sink - a place to stash projects, experiments, and notes as I keep exploring. Think of it as a mix of stuff I want to learn, stuff I'm picking up along the way and then buzzwords that I want to breakdown for myself.


Aside from work, I'm a lowkey foodie and a staight up caffeine addict. Feel free to ping me to discuss tech, food, startups, books or just about anything under the sun.
